name: Scrap Defence
description:
Robots are rising up and plot to take over the world! Although being the smart engineer you are, come up with an idea to take down the robots to save the world. By constructing an EMP tower, you can deactivate all the robots in the world, although it has to be charged up and its glowing peak has alerted the robots to your location. Can you fend off the robots for long enough to save the world?

Default Bindings:

WASD - Move

1-4 - Select tool

Alt - Inspect

Space - FastForward

Esc - Pause

Left Click- Buying/Placing Items + Smelting

Right Click - Use Selected tool
